name: Introduction to C language
details: Get started with the fundamentals of programming using the C language. This course will teach you the core concepts.

name: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Dive into the world of algorithms in this comprehensive course. Learn how to analyze and design efficient algorithms.

name: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: Master the fundamentals of C++ programming with a focus on data structures and algorithms.

name: Basic Data Structures
details: Explore essential data structures such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues. Learn how to use them.

name: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Get started with Python's object-oriented programming (OOP) principles. Discover how to design and implement classes.

name: Software Engineering
details: Gain a deep understanding of software development methodologies, project management, and best practices.

name: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Explore Amazon Web Services (AWS) and delve into the world of cloud computing. Learn how to deploy.

name: Database (MySQL)
details: Learn the ins and outs of MySQL, a powerful relational database management system.

name: Problem-Solving Part
details: Sharpen your problem-solving skills in this course. Explore strategies and techniques to tackle problems.
